name: Health notebook & diary -- black/white binder
description:
To help take the best care of yourself or a loved one, it is important to keep track of every aspect of your health.


This 'base' binder ('half-size' binder - 5.5" x 8.5") comes filled with:

'About me' section = list your allergies, pharmacy information, and emergency contact. Keep track of your past medical history, hospitalizations, and OB history.

'Medication' list = keep track of your medications, the dosage, time of day to take them, when you started them, and when/why you stopped a particular medicine.

'Appointments' = never miss another appointment again! Also with space to write important notes/questions to ask your doctor (you always forget until the doctor is almost to the door, right?!).


Comes in black&white binder OR green binder.
